turns.speaker: SPEAKER_01
turns.text: Doctor, I usually take Panadol when I have migraines, but recently the pain hasn't improved.

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_00
turns.text: How long has the headache been lasting each time?

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_01
turns.text: It lasts for around 6 hours, sometimes longer, for the past two weeks.

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_00
turns.text: Any nausea, vision changes, or dizziness?

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_01
turns.text: Yes, nausea but no dizziness or blurred vision.
